signin_card_description: Welcome Back! Sign in below to access your account.
label_no_account: New to VibeSpot? Sign Up Here.
signup_description: Enter your information to create an account
toast_update_userrole_error: Failed to update user role to
account_info_description: Manage your account settings and preferences.
account_switch_role_description: Switch betweeen the Artist role or Enthusiast role. Only Artists are able to create events. Default is Enthusiast.
account_data_export_description: Download a copy of your data.
account_delete_description: Once you delete your account, there is no going back. Please be certain.
account_delete_confirm: I understand the consequences, delete my account.
account_danger_zone_description: These actions are irreversible and destructive. Please proceed with caution.
delete_modal_description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your account and remove your data from our servers.
security_info_description: Manage your account security and authentication.
security_password_description: Change your account password regularly to keep your account secure.
security_2fa_description: Two-factor authentication adds an extra layer of security to your account by requiring more than just a password to sign in.
onb_description: Lets get you started with setting up your profile.
onb_Artist_Description: The Creator. Create & manage upcoming events, engage with attendees & grow your community.
onb_Enthusiast_Description: The Concert enjoyer. Find events & artists of your liking, connect with others & enjoy the vibe!
onb_card2_label: Next, please provide some additional information to help us personalize your experience.
onb_card3_description: Thank you for joining VibeSpot. We're excited to have you on board!
onb_card3_label: You're all set! Click the button below to explore VibeSpot and start discovering or creating events.
create_event_description: Fill in the details below to create your event.
form_title_description: What's the name of your event?
form_description_placeholder: A three-day music festival in Gothenburg, Sweden...
form_description_description: Describe the Vibe of your event. What makes it special?
form_venue_description: In what Venue is the event happening?
form_address_description: Where's the Vibe? (must be a full address)
form_color_description: Choose a color to represent your event on the calendar.
form_start_date_description: At what time and date does your event start?
form_end_date_description: At what time and date does your event end?
form_genre_description: What genre best fits your event?
form_repeat_description: How often does this event repeat?
toast_login_required: You must be logged in to create an event.
toast_event_failed: Failed to create event. Please try again.
toast_comment_login_required: You must be logged in to post a comment.
toast_comment_failed: Failed to post comment. Please try again.
toast_comment_error: An error occurred while posting your comment.
toast_event_not_found: Event not found, please try again later.
toast_favorite_add_failed: Failed to add event to favorites. Please try again.
toast_favorite_remove_failed: Failed to remove event from favorites. Please try again.
calendar_no_appointments: No events going on at the moment
calendar_week_not_recommended: Weekly view is not recommended on smaller devices.
calendar_use_desktop: Please switch to a desktop device or use the daily view instead.
delete_event_description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your event and remove event data from our servers.
toast_event_create_role: You must be an Artist to create events.
